articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il sees samples and art works
articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il sees samples and art works
  PYONGYANG, MARCH 6 (KCNA) -- SECRETARY KIM JONG IL, SUPREME
COMMANDER OF THE KOREAN PEOPLE'S ARMY (KPA), ON TUESDAY SAW 
ANIMAL AND PLANT SAMPLES AND FINE ART WORKS PRODUCED BY 
SOLDIERS OF THE PEOPLE'S ARMY.
   HE FIRST SAW THE SAMPLES OF RARE WILD ANIMALS AND PLANTS 
OF SEVERAL DOZEN KINDS OF KOREA.
   HE SAID THE SAMPLES SHOULD BE SENT TO EDUCATIONAL 
INSTITUTIONS FOR EFFECTIVE EDUCATION OF STUDENTS AND THAT 
THE YOUNGER GENERATIONS SHOULD BE EDUCATED TO LEARN FROM THE 
PATRIOTISM OF SOLDIERS AND BECOME TRUE SERVANTS FOR THE 
COUNTRY AND THE PEOPLE.
   HE THEN APPRECIATED FINE ART WORKS, INCLUDING KOREAN 
PAINTINGS, OIL PAINTINGS, JEWEL PAINTINGS, SCULPTURES, 
EMBROIDERIES AND CRAFTS. 
   HE EXPRESSED GREAT SATISFACTION WITH THE WORKS THAT 
REFLECT THE HEROIC STAMINA AND FIGHTING SPIRIT OF THE KPA.   
 THE KPA SOLDIERS EACH CAN MATCH A HUNDRED FOES AND THEY 
HAVE HIGH CULTURAL AND ARTISTIC QUALITIES, HE SAID. 
   PRESENT ON THE OCCASION WERE KPA VICE MARSHALS JO MYONG 
ROK AND KIM YONG CHUN, SECRETARIES OF THE WORKERS' PARTY OF 
KOREA CENTRAL COMMITTEE CHOE THAE BOK, KIM KUK THAE, KIM KI 
NAM AND KIM YONG SUN AND OTHER OFFICIALS CONCERNED.

articles.title: Secy. Kim Jong Il sees products of soldiers
articles.content:
Secy. Kim Jong Il sees products of soldiers
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 6 (KCNA) -- SECRETARY KIM JONG IL, SUPREME
COMMANDER OF THE KOREAN PEOPLE'S ARMY (KPA), ON TUESDAY SAW 
ANIMAL AND PLANT SAMPLES AND FINE ART WORKS PRODUCED BY 
SOLDIERS OF THE PEOPLE'S ARMY.
   HE FIRST SAW THE SAMPLES OF RARE WILD ANIMALS AND PLANTS 
OF SEVERAL DOZEN KINDS OF KOREA.
   SEEING HUNDREDS OF SAMPLES ASSOCIATED WITH SINCERITY OF 
SOLDIERS, HE EXPRESSED GREAT SATISFACTION AND HIGHLY PRAISED 
SOLDIERS FOR HAVING DONE GOOD THINGS FOR POSTERITY.
   THIS NOBLE DEED CAN BE DONE ONLY BY KPA SOLDIERS WHO HAVE 
A RESOLUTION TO DEVOTEDLY FIGHT FOR THE PROSPERITY AND 
SECURITY OF THE COUNTRY AND FIRM CONFIDENCE IN THE VICTORY 
OF REVOLUTION, HE NOTED.
   HE SAID THE SAMPLES SHOULD BE SENT TO EDUCATIONAL 
INSTITUTIONS FOR EFFECTIVE EDUCATION OF STUDENTS AND THAT 
THE YOUNGER GENERATIONS SHOULD BE EDUCATED TO LEARN FROM THE 
PATRIOTISM OF SOLDIERS AND BECOME TRUE SERVANTS FOR THE 
COUNTRY AND THE PEOPLE.
   HE THEN APPRECIATED FINE ART WORKS, INCLUDING KOREAN 
PAINTINGS, OIL PAINTINGS, JEWEL PAINTINGS, SCULPTURES, 
EMBROIDERIES AND CRAFTS EXHIBITED IN THE REVOLUTIONARY 
MUSEUM OF THE MINISTRY OF THE PEOPLE'S ARMED FORCES.
   HE EXPRESSED GREAT SATISFACTION WITH THE MANY WORKS OF 
HIGH IDEOLOGICAL AND ARTISTIC VALUE THAT REFLECT THE HEROIC 
STAMINA AND FIGHTING SPIRIT OF THE KPA. HE SHOWED HIGH 
APPRECIATION FOR THE SOLDIERS' WORKS.
   THE KPA SOLDIERS ARE SO PREPARED IN POLITICO-IDEOLOGICAL 
ASPECTS AND MILITARY TECHNIQUE THAT THEY EACH CAN MATCH A 
HUNDRED FOES AND THEY HAVE HIGH CULTURAL AND ARTISTIC 
QUALITIES, HE SAID. 
   PRESENT ON THE OCCASION WERE KPA VICE MARSHALS JO MYONG 
ROK AND KIM YONG CHUN, KPA GENERALS HYON CHOL HAE, KIM HA 
GYU AND PAK JAE GYONG AND COL. GENERALS RI MYONG SU AND KIM 
TAE SIK. SECRETARIES OF THE WORKERS' PARTY OF KOREA CENTRAL 
COMMITTEE CHOE THAE BOK, KIM KUK THAE, KIM KI NAM AND KIM 
YONG SUN= FIRST SECRETARY OF THE KIM IL SUNG SOCIALIST YOUTH 
LEAGUE CENTRAL COMMITTEE CHOE RYONG HAE= AND FIRST VICE 
DEPARTMENT DIRECTORS OF THE WPK CENTRAL COMMITTEE RI YONG 
CHOL AND JANG SONG THAEK WERE ALSO ON HAND.

articles.title: Publications praising Secy. Kim Jong Il found in s. Korea
articles.content:
Publications praising Secy. Kim Jong Il found in s. Korea
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 6 (KCNA) -- 200 COPIES OF PUBLICATIONS 
PRAISING THE RESPECTED SECRETARY KIM JONG IL WERE FOUND IN 
TAEDOK-RI, HOJO-MYON, WONJU CITY, SOUTH KOREAN KANGWON 
PROVINCE ON MARCH 4, SAID A RADIO REPORT FROM SEOUL.
   SUCH LITERATURE WAS FOUND HERE AND THERE, STIRRING UP 
PASSERS-BY WHILE REVERENCE FOR HIM WAS GROWING AMONG THE 
SOUTH KOREAN PEOPLE.

articles.title: "Study Room of Juche" opened in Nicaragua
articles.content:
"Study Room of Juche" opened in Nicaragua
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 6 (KCNA) -- THE NICARAGUAN COMMITTEE FOR 
THE STUDY OF KIMJONGILISM OPENED THE "STUDY ROOM OF JUCHE" 
ON FEB. 9 ON THE OCCASION OF THE 55TH BIRTHDAY OF SECRETARY 
KIM JONG IL.
   PUT ON DISPLAY AT THE STUDY ROOM ARE FAMOUS WORKS OF THE 
GREAT LEADERS PRESIDENT KIM IL SUNG AND SECRETARY KIM JONG IL 
INCLUDING "KIM IL SUNG'S WORKS" AND "KIM IL SUNG'S SELECTED 
WORKS" AND MATERIALS FOR THE STUDY OF THE JUCHE IDEA.
   AFTER THE OPENING OF THE ROOM A LECTURE MEETING ON THE 
REVOLUTIONARY HISTORY AND GREATNESS OF SECRETARY KIM JONG IL 
WAS HELD, AT WHICH THE CHAIRMAN OF THE COMMITTEE SAID:
   SECRETARY KIM JONG IL IS THE GREAT MAN OF THE CENTURY WHOM 
THE WORLD'S REVOLUTIONARIES SHOULD FOLLOW.
   HE HAS PERFORMED IMMORTAL FEATS FOR THE TIMES AND HISTORY 
BY CONDUCTING TIRELESS REVOLUTIONARY ACTIVITIES WITH HIS 
HIGH INTENTION TO ACCOMPLISH THE REVOLUTIONARY CAUSE OF 
JUCHE PIONEERED BY PRESIDENT KIM IL SUNG FROM HIS EARLY 
YEARS. IT IS THE NATURAL DUTY AND GREAT HONOR OF THE 
REVOLUTIONARIES TO MAKE A DEEP STUDY OF HIS REVOLUTIONARY 
HISTORY AND GREATNESS AND WIDELY PROPAGANDISE THEM.

articles.title: "KCTU" declares fifth-stage general strike
articles.content:
"KCTU" declares fifth-stage general strike 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 6 (KCNA) -- THE "KOREAN CONFEDERATION OF 
TRADE UNIONS" (KCTU) IN SOUTH KOREA HELD A RALLY IN FRONT OF 
THE "NATIONAL ASSEMBLY" BUILDING WEDNESDAY WITH THE 
ATTENDANCE OF ABOVE 300 LOCAL UNION LEADERS AND CALLED FOR 
THE REAMENDMENT OF "LABOUR LAWS", ACCORDING TO A RADIO 
REPORT FROM SEOUL.
   THE KCTU DECLARED THAT IT WOULD GO ON THE FIFTH-STAGE 
GENERAL STRIKE UNLESS THE PUPPET AUTHORITIES REAMEND THE 
RETROGRESSIVELY REVISED "LABOUR LAWS" UNTIL MARCH 8. IT ALSO 
SAID OVER 1,000 CHAIRMEN OF AFFILIATED UNIONS WILL STAGE A 
SIT-IN IN FRONT OF THE "NATIONAL ASSEMBLY" BUILDING FROM 
MARCH 6.LARGE-SCALE PROTEST RALLIES WILL BE HELD IN 20 ODD 
AREAS INCLUDING SEOUL ON MARCH 8, THE ORGANIZATION ADDED.

articles.title: American newspapers mark birthday of Secy. Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
American newspapers mark birthday of Secy. Kim Jong Il 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 6 (KCNA) -- AMERICAN NEWSPAPERS DEDICATED 
ARTICLES TO THE 55TH BIRTHDAY OF SECRETARY KIM JONG IL.
   THE NEW YORK TIMES DATED FEB. 16 CARRIED A SPECIAL 
WRITEUP UNDER THE HEADLINE "WARM CONGRATULATIONS TO THE 
LEADER ON HIS 55TH BIRTHDAY".
   THE PAPER CARRIED A COLOR PICTURE OF COMRADE KIM JONG IL 
AND, BELOW IT, AN ARTICLE ENTITLED "THE GREATEST HERO 
PRODUCED BY JUCHE KOREA", WHICH SAID: THE RESPECTED 
SECRETARY KIM JONG IL, WHO IS AN OUTSTANDING THINKER AND 
THEORETICIAN, A PROMINENT LEADER AND IS POSSESSED OF NOBLE 
VIRTUES, IS THE GREAT SUN OF THE 21ST CENTURY.
   THE WORKERS' WORLD OF FEBRUARY FOURTH WEEKLY ISSUE 
CARRIED AN ARTICLE ENTITLED "SUPPORT TO SOCIALIST KOREA". 
THE PAPER STRESSED SECRETARY KIM JONG IL TOOK OVER THE CAUSE 
OF THE GREAT PRESIDENT KIM IL SUNG AND IS WISELY LEADING THE 
KOREAN PEOPLE TO SOCIALISM.

articles.title: Streamer celebrating Secy. Kim Jong Il's birthday appears  in s. Korea
articles.content:
Streamer celebrating Secy. Kim Jong Il's birthday appears  in s. Korea 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 6 (KCNA) -- A BALLOON AND A STREAMER 
CELEBRATING THE 55TH BIRTHDAY OF THE GREAT LEADER 
SECRETARY KIM JONG IL WERE SEEN IN THE SKY ABOVE MAESAN-DONG, 
SUWON CITY, ON FEB. 16, MOVING INHABITANTS, SAID THE SEOUL-
BASED RADIO VOICE OF NATIONAL SALVATION QUOTING INFORMATION 
OF THE KYONGGI PROVINCIAL COMMITTEE OF THE NATIONAL 
DEMOCRATIC FRONT OF SOUTH KOREA.
   THE BALLOON 1.5 METRES IN DIAMETER WAS TIED WITH A STRING 
SOME 30 METRES HIGH IN THE AIR.
    WRITTEN ON THE BALLOON IN RED WERE BIG LETTERS 
"CONGRATULATIONS TO THE LEADER KIM JONG IL, A PEERLESS GREAT 
MAN, ON HIS 55TH BIRTHDAY !"
   ON THE FRONT SIDE OF THE HANGING STREAMER 2.5 METRES LONG 
AND 1 METRES WIDE, WERE BLUE LETTERS "WE SINCERELY WISH A 
LONGEVITY TO THE LEADER KIM JONG IL, THE GREAT MAN FOR ALL 
AGES !" AND ON THE BACK WERE LETTERS "THE PEOPLE IN THE 
SOUTH WAIT FOR THE GREAT LEADER OF THE REUNIFIED COUNTRY 
KIM JONG IL ! THE FEBRUARY 16 FELLOWSHIP SOCIETY."

articles.title: Press review
articles.content:
Press review 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 6 (KCNA) -- PAPERS HERE TODAY REPORT 
THAT SECRETARY KIM JONG IL, CHAIRMAN OF THE 
DPRK NATIONAL DEFENCE COMMISSION AND SUPREME COMMANDER OF 
THE KOREAN PEOPLE'S ARMY (KPA), SAW ANIMAL AND PLANT SAMPLES 
AND FINE ART WORKS PRODUCED BY SOLDIERS OF THE PEOPLE'S 
ARMY. UNDER THE TITLE "SOCIALIST CAUSE IS INVINCIBLE AS IT IS 
LED BY OUR GENERAL" RODONG SINMUN EDITS ARTICLES STRESSING 
THAT COMRADE KIM JONG IL'S INSPECTION OF UNIT 212 OF THE 
KPA, WHICH DEFENDS THE FOREFRONT ON THE WEST COAST, IS THE 
REVOLUTIONARY ACTIVITIES OF THE GREAT DEFENDER FOR THE 
SECURITY OF THE FATHERLAND AND PEOPLE.
   IT CARRIES NEWS THAT THE 55TH BIRTHDAY OF SECRETARY
KIM JONG IL WAS CELEBRATED IN DIFFERENT COUNTRIES AND THE 
NICARAGUAN COMMITTEE FOR THE STUDY OF KIMJONGILISM OPENED 
THE "STUDY ROOM OF JUCHE".
   GIVEN IN THE PRESS IS NEWS OF PREPARATIONS FOR SOWING ON 
COOPERATIVE FARMS AND INNOVATIONS IN COAL PRODUCTION.
   PAPERS CARRY NEWS THAT THE KOREAN CONFEDERATION OF 
TRADE UNIONS IN SOUTH KOREA DECLARED THE FIFTH-STAGE GENERAL 
STRIKE CALLING FOR REAMENDING THE EVIL LABOUR LAW.
   PAPERS RUN ARTICLES STRESSING THAT KIM YOUNG SAM, A 
KINGPIN OF IRREGULARITIES WHO DESTROYED THE SOUTH KOREAN 
ECONOMY, MUST BE PUNISHED. GIVEN IN THE PRESS ARE 
REFLECTIONS ON IT AT HOME AND ABROAD.
   RODONG SINMUN CARRIES A COMMENTARY DENOUNCING THE "PARTY 
AND GOVERNMENT RESHUFFLE" STAGED BY THE KIM YOUNG SAM GROUP 
AS A POLITICAL FARCE TO GET OUT OF THE CRISIS.
   THE PAPER OBSERVES THE NATIONAL DAY OF GHANA.
   THE PAPER PRINTS  AN ARTICLE TITLED "REACTIONARY NATURE 
OF 'LEGALISM' ON THE LIPS OF IMPERIALISTS".

articles.title: Ghanaian National Day observed
articles.content:
Ghanaian National Day observed

   SINCE THE INDEPENDENCE THE GHANAIAN PEOPLE HAVE 
CONSOLIDATED NATIONAL INDEPENDENCE AND MADE EFFORTS TO BUILD

   THE KOREAN AND GHANAIAN PEOPLES HAVE HAD THE FRIENDLY

   THE KOREAN PEOPLE WARMLY CONGRATULATE THE GHANAIAN PEOPLE 
ON THE 40TH ANNIVERSARY OF INDEPENDENCE AND WISH THEM NEW

articles.title: Liquidation of corrupt power urged
articles.content:
Liquidation of corrupt power urged 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 6 (KCNA) -- 508 KOREAN RESIDENTS IN 
NORTH AMERICA JOINTLY PUBLISHED A DECLARATION ON SITUATION 
ON FEB. 22 DENOUNCING THE RAILROADING OF THE FASCIST LAWS IN 
SOUTH KOREA AND DEMANDING THE LIQUIDATION OF THE CORRUPT 
POWER, ACCORDING TO A SOUTH KOREAN NEWSPAPER REPORT.
   CONTENDING THAT THE "CIVILIAN ERA" HAS DISAPPEARED AND A 
BLACK ANGEL OF CORRUPTNESS AND DICTATORSHIP REVIVED, THE 
DECLARATION SAID FELLOW COUNTRYMEN AT HOME AND ABROAD HAVE 
TURNED THEIR BACK ON THE KIM YOUNG SAM "GOVERNMENT".
   THE PRESENT "GOVERNMENT" HAS MADE A PRETEXT OF 
"COMPETITIVE POWER" AND "SECURITY" FOR THE RETROGRESSIVELY 
AMENDED "LABOUR LAWS" AND THE "LAW ON THE AGENCY FOR 
NATIONAL SECURITY PLANNING" WHICH WERE RAILROADED. BUT IF IT 
IS TRULY WILLING TO INCREASE THE COMPETITIVE POWER AND 
ENSURE SECURITY, IT SHOULD ERADICATE POLITICS-BUSINESS 
COLLUSION, IRREGULARITIES AND PLUTOCRATIC DESPOTISM AND 
PROVIDE THE PEOPLE WITH GENUINE FREEDOM AND DEMOCRACY, THE 
DECLARATION STRESSED.
   OVERSEAS COMPATRIOTS ARE JOINING THE FELLOW COUNTRYMEN IN 
THE SOUTH IN THE ALL-PEOPLE MOVEMENT FOR DEMOCRACY, IT SAID, 
EXTENDING SUPPORT AND ENCOURAGEMENT TO THE WORKERS' STRIKE 
AND MOVEMENT AGAINST DICTATORSHIP AND CORRUPTNESS.

articles.title: Health care for old people in Korea
articles.content:
Health care for old people in Korea 
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 6 (KCNA) -- THE NUMBER OF MACROBIANS IS 
ON A STEADY RISE IN KOREA.
   THE LAST DECADE HAS WITNESSED FIVE TIMES AS MANY 
MACROBIANS ABOVE 90 YEARS OF AGE AS THE PREVIOUS ONE DID.
   THOSE ABOVE A HUNDRED YEARS OF AGE IN 1993 WERE NEARLY 
THREE TIMES AS MANY AS IN 1971.
   THIS IS ATTRIBUTABLE TO THE STATE'S DEEP CARE AND FAVORS 
FOR THE HEALTH OF OLD PEOPLE.
   THERE ARE GERIATRIC SECTIONS IN MEDICAL UNIVERSITY 
HOSPITALS IN ALL PROVINCES OF THE COUNTRY, WHERE OLD PEOPLE 
HAVE REGULAR CHECK-UPS SO THAT DISEASES ARE DETECTED IN 
EARLY STAGES AND MEDICAL TREATMENT IS GIVEN IN TIME.
   DOCTORS IN CHARGE OF OLD PEOPLE MAKE HOUSE-TO-HOUSE CALLS 
TO LOOK AFTER THEIR HEALTH SYSTEMATICALLY AND 
SCIENTIFICALLY, SUPPLY THEM WITH TONICS AND PROMOTE THEIR 
HEALTH.
   SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH INTO LONGEVITY OF OLD PEOPLE IS A 
CONCERN OF THE STATE.
   IN THE CAPITAL CITY OF PYONGYANG, THERE HAS BEEN SET UP A 
JOINT STUDY CENTRE OF GERIATRICS AND GERONTOLOGY UNDER THE 
WORLD HEALTH ORGANISATION, WHICH HELPS MAKE GREAT PROGRESS 
IN SCIENTIFIC RESEARCH INTO THE PROTECTION AND PROMOTION OF 
PEOPLE'S HEALTH.
   THE CENTRE HAS ABLE SCIENTISTS AND TECHNICIANS AND MODERN 
MEDICAL FACILITIES. IT ISSUES A MAGAZINE "SENILITY AND 
HEALTH" AND AN INFORMATION BULLETIN REGULARLY TO 
DISSEMINATE KOREA'S ACHIEVEMENTS IN JUCHE-BASED RESEARCH 
INTO MEDICAL SCIENCE TO SCORES OF COUNTRIES OF THE WORLD AND 
POSITIVELY CONTRIBUTE TO THE DEVELOPMENT OF INTERNATIONAL 
GERIATRICS.
   KOREA WILL HAVE A LARGER NUMBER OF "FAMILIES AND VILLAGES 
OF MACROBIANS."

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun discloses reactionary nature of "legalism"
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun discloses reactionary nature of "legalism"
   PYONGYANG, MARCH 6 (KCNA) -- RODONG SINMUN TODAY CARRIES 
A SIGNED ARTICLE LAYING BARE THE REACTIONARY NATURE OF 
"LEGALISM" ADVERTIZED BY THE IMPERIALISTS AND THEIR 
MOUTHPIECES.
   IN AN ARTICLE TITLED "REACTIONARY NATURE OF 'LEGALISM' ON 
THE LIPS OF IMPERIALISTS" THE DAILY SAYS THE BOURGEOIS 
"LEGALISM" IS AN UNSCIENTIFIC REACTIONARY SOPHISM WHICH 
DISTORTS CORRELATIONS BETWEEN LAW AND POLITICS. IT GOES ON:
   THE REACTIONARY NATURE OF "LEGALISM" IS EXPRESSED IN 
DISTORTING THE CLASS CHARACTERS AND ESSENCE OF LAW AND 
VOCIFERATING ABOUT "ABSTRACTION" AND "SUPERCLASS CHARACTER" 
TO DESCRIBE AS IF THE BOURGEOIS LAW REFLECTS THE WILL AND 
INTERESTS OF ALL THE MEMBERS OF SOCIETY. THE LAW REFLECTS 
ONLY THE WILL AND INTERESTS OF THE CLASS IN POWER AND IS THE 
GENERAL RULE OF CONDUCT WHOSE OBSERVANCE IS GUARANTEED BY 
THE STATE POWER, A MEANS OF THE CLASS DICTATORSHIP. 
ACCORDINGLY, THE LAW ASSUMES CLASS CHARACTER IN ANY SOCIETY.
   "LEGALISM" IS AIMED AT DISTORTING THE CORRELATIONS 
BETWEEN THE LAW AND POLITICS AND BETWEEN THE LAW AND STATE, 
ABSOLUTIZING "PREDOMINANCE OF LAW OVER POLITICS" AND "LAW 
OVER STATE" AND COVERING UP THE REACTIONARY RULE OF THE 
IMPERIALIST AND CAPITALIST STATE.
   PREACHING "SUPERCLASS CHARACTER" OF THE LAW, A MEANS OF 
ADMINISTERING POLITICS, AND "PREDOMINANCE OF LAW OVER 
POLITICS AND STATE" IS AN UNSCIENTIFIC LOGIC DISTORTING THE 
ESSENCE OF THE LAW AND POLITICS AND THEIR CORRELATIONS.
   THE IMPERIALISTS ARE ADMINISTERING THE ANTI-SOCIAL 
DICTATORIAL POLITICS MORE EASILY UNDER THE SIGNBOARD OF 
"LEGALISM" AND LAWFULLY CRACKING DOWN ON THE MOVEMENT OF THE 
PEOPLE FOR INDEPENDENCE UNDER THE CLOAK OF "CONTROL BY LAW". 
HEREIN LIES ONE OF THE REACTIONARY NATURE OF "LEGALISM" ON 
THE LIPS OF THE IMPERIALISTS.
   "LEGALISM" IS ALSO AIMED AT PRETENDING TO FULLY GUARANTEE 
THE FREEDOM AND EQUALITY OF ALL THE PEOPLE, WHILE DEFENDING 
THE MODERN CAPITALIST SYSTEM WHICH OBLITERATES THEIR 
FREEDOM, EQUALITY AND VITAL RIGHT.
   "LEGALISM" IS THE MOST REACTIONARY POLITICAL IDEA AND A 
MODE OF RULE TO CONCEAL THE BOURGEOIS DICTATORSHIP OF THE 
CAPITALIST CLASS AND FULLY ENSURE THE IMPERIALISTS' 
POLITICAL DOMINATION OVER THE WORKING MASSES.
